item.title: Why It's Called March Madness
item.description: My notebook and game recipe was formed off of the classic sports saying, “offense is the best defense”. I believe that the fundamental thought that constantly scoring will result in a win, will apply to March Madness. The predictors I will use are effective fg %, true shooting %, rebounds, only offensive ,three point %, free throw %, point per game true shooting % and points per possession. I added free throw % and points per possession to the recipe because I think it matters if teams can capitalize off stopping their opponent.

item.title: Do NHL Goalies Perform Better in the Postseason?
item.description: If you watch any team oriented sport, you will hear the phrase “Defense wins championships,”. However, I believe that in the NHL your goalie’s performance is even more enhanced compared to the regular season. If you watch the NHL playoffs most will agree there isn’t many other postseasons like it. The energy is unmatched. My belief is that if your goalie becomes “hot” in the playoffs they will win more games.
